cheml
function:
SaveFile

input DataFrame

## Store
<< host = cheml    << function = SaveFile
<< filename = ''
<< output_directory  =  None
<< record_time  =  False
<< format  = 'csv'
<< index  =  False
<< header  =  True
>> id df
>> filepath id

Note

The rest of parameters (if any) can be set the same way.
